text: Free University Amsterdam (Dutch: Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam), shortened to VU, is a (Calvinist) public university in Amsterdam, a city in the province of North Holland, and also the capital city of the Netherlands. Free University Amsterdam was established by Abraham Kuyper in 1880. It has about 30,000 students. Its focus is on all sorts of sciences. == Other websites == * Category:Calvinism Category:Christian colleges and universities Category:Colleges and universities in the Netherlands Category:Protestantism in the Netherlands Category:1880 establishments in Europe Category:1880s establishments in the Netherlands Category:Organizations based in Amsterdam
title: Free University Amsterdam
